body_html:
@Moondra Maybe I am not understanding what you're asking. But the method to install the Windows build is above,, namely:
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch=0.1.12
Once that's done you can optinally add torchvision with:
pip install torchvision

body:
@Moondra Maybe I am not understanding what you're asking. But the method to install the Windows build is above,, namely:
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch=0.1.12
Once that's done you can optinally add torchvision with:
pip install torchvision
